description:
For those new to programming and Python, the best way to learn the
language can be confusing. However, the web provides many avenues from
MOOCs, learning communities, user groups, books, online tutorials, and
Q&A sites to begin learning and build skills. What path should you take
as a solo learner? This talk will provide an overview of places to get
started and strategies to learn smarter. .
title: Learning to learn Python
